author: Red Means Recording
description:
A musician took my Volca Beats from Scratch video, sampled the audio, added some effects, and called it theirs. Then the fun began. My original video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8kmb1VlAtZ4
I'm specifically not naming this person because I don't want a dogpile. It's mostly their label and The Orchard's fault.

I'm DJing Furality Somna as "Arpeggio": https://furality.org/online-xperience

Support the channel on Patreon: http://bit.ly/rmrpatreon
Take a lesson with me: https://rmr.media/education

Find my music here: 
Bandcamp: http://bit.ly/2Kq617o

title: They Stole My Audio and Claimed My Video
